snippet.title: Grit and Valor 1949 Gameplay Trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Some exclusive new gameplay of this dieselpunk real-time tactics rogue-lite, in which you command an elite squad of mechs in an alternate World War II. As revealed in the Convergence Showcase.

Wishlist it today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1911860/Grit_and_Valor__1949/

#convergenceshow #indiegame
